name: botbuilder-node
author: Microsoft Corp.
description: Node dependencies for Bot Builder core library. Bot Builder is a toolkit for building rich bots on virtually any platform.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder-node --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\botbuilder-node .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK - Node" --readme none
